createVault(address,address,address,stri.details: this function is used by the controller to create vaults on behalf of the users

params.projectName: the project name of the vault
params.rewardToken: the erc20 token address to reward users with
params.targetVaultFactory: the address of the vault factory used to create the vault

returns.vault: the address of the created vault

vaultReward(address,address,uint256).details: this function is used to interact with a target vault's single target reward function

params.amount: the amount of reward to send
